name: Image Recognition Pollination Robot
description: Built an autonomous robot using TensorFlow's MobileNetV2 to identify flower types for pollination purposes.

name: California Housing Prices Data Analysis
description: Performed a planned analysis on the California housing market using supervised models to evaluate predictor influence on housing prices.

name: Social Media Screensaver
description: Cross-platform Electron app integrating Instagram and Reddit APIs to dynamically generate personalized screensavers.

name: Car Part Web Scraper
description: Web scraping tool that aggregates and compares car part prices, with CI/CD automation and unit testing in Jenkins.

name: Word Worm
description: A 2D side-scroller that teaches children to spell and read. Play as a worm collecting apples to spell sight words. Built in Unity for Android and iOS.
